column1: text
I moved to Malta to be with my boyfriend. We bought a house together. We broke up. We still live together and he’s currently downstairs ‘entertaining’ female guests.
Buddy thinks he is Jesus, needs help being humble.
this is my friend Lily, she’s 48, adult entertainer, loves toes
I'm 23 today. Make it hurt.
I'm a programmer and my only two friends date each other. Do your worst
22, I have 3 cats and get paid to watch anime/ lurk on reddit (receptionist) entertain me with your insults
18, ugly, virgin, engineering student, depressed, uses paper plates instead of paper, sauté me
27, this is my favorite shirt, I listen to soundcloud artists, and I’m an loner. Let me have it.
a bird quite literally shat on me today so i'm here to get shit on again. roast me.

checking after i get off work
Half Mexican and I made it out the hood, went bald at 17.
my boyfriend hasn’t had sex with me in 7 months and idk why. make me cry reddit
Hit him harder than your dad
Hey wanna help destroy my cake day?
